summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 31
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Tuesday, with 13 gaining and four declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.4% to $23,114 by market close.
